member.name: T:Plugin.Geolocator.Abstractions.ActivityType
member.summary: Activity type (iOS only). Used to determine when to automatically pause location updates.

member.name: F:Plugin.Geolocator.Abstractions.ActivityType.Other
member.summary: GPS is being used for an unknown activity.

member.name: F:Plugin.Geolocator.Abstractions.ActivityType.AutomotiveNavigation
member.summary: GPS is being used specifically during vehicular navigation to track location changes to the automobile. This activity might cause location updates to be paused only when the vehicle does not move for an extended period of time.

member.name: F:Plugin.Geolocator.Abstractions.ActivityType.Fitness
member.summary: GPS is being used to track any pedestrian-related activity. This activity might cause location updates to be paused only when the user does not move a significant distance over a period of time.

member.name: F:Plugin.Geolocator.Abstractions.ActivityType.OtherNavigation
member.summary: GPS is being used to track movements for other types of vehicular navigation that are not automobile related. For example, you would use this to track navigation by boat, train, or plane. Do not use this type for pedestrian navigation tracking. This activity might cause location updates to be paused only when the vehicle does not move a significant distance over a period of time.

member.name: P:Plugin.Geolocator.Abstractions.Address.CountryCode
member.summary: Gets or sets the country ISO code.

member.name: P:Plugin.Geolocator.Abstractions.Address.CountryName
member.summary: Gets or sets the country name.

member.name: P:Plugin.Geolocator.Abstractions.Address.FeatureName
member.summary: Gets or sets a featured name.

member.name: P:Plugin.Geolocator.Abstractions.Address.PostalCode
member.summary: Gets or sets a postal code.

member.name: P:Plugin.Geolocator.Abstractions.Address.SubLocality
member.summary: Gets or sets a sub locality.

member.name: P:Plugin.Geolocator.Abstractions.Address.Thoroughfare
member.summary: Gets or sets a street name.

member.name: P:Plugin.Geolocator.Abstractions.Address.SubThoroughfare
member.summary: Gets or sets optional info: sub street or region.

member.name: P:Plugin.Geolocator.Abstractions.Address.AdminArea
member.summary: Gets or sets the administrative area name of the address, for example, "CA", or null if it is unknown

member.name: P:Plugin.Geolocator.Abstractions.Address.SubAdminArea
member.summary: Gets or sets the sub-administrative area name of the address, for example, "Santa Clara County", or null if it is unknown

member.name: P:Plugin.Geolocator.Abstractions.IGeolocator.IsListening
member.summary: Gets if you are listening for location changes

member.name: P:Plugin.Geolocator.Abstractions.IGeolocator.IsGeolocationAvailable
member.summary: Gets if geolocation is available on device

member.name: P:Plugin.Geolocator.Abstractions.IGeolocator.IsGeolocationEnabled
member.summary: Gets if geolocation is enabled on device

member.name: M:Plugin.Geolocator.Abstractions.IGeolocator.GetLastKnownLocationAsync
member.summary: Gets the last known and most accurate location. This is usually cached and best to display first before querying for full position.
member.returns: Best and most recent location or null if none found

member.name: M:Plugin.Geolocator.Abstractions.IGeolocator.GetPositionAsync(System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan},System.Nullable{System.Threading.CancellationToken},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets position async with specified parameters
member.param: If you would like to include heading

member.name: M:Plugin.Geolocator.Abstractions.IGeolocator.GetAddressesForPositionAsync(Plugin.Geolocator.Abstractions.Position,System.String)
member.param: Map Key required only on UWP

member.name: M:Plugin.Geolocator.Abstractions.IGeolocator.GetPositionsForAddressAsync(System.String,System.String)
member.param: Map Key required only on UWP

member.name: M:Plugin.Geolocator.Abstractions.IGeolocator.StartListeningAsync(System.TimeSpan,System.Double,System.Boolean,Plugin.Geolocator.Abstractions.ListenerSettings)
member.param: Distance distance in meters between updates

member.name: T:Plugin.Geolocator.Abstractions.ListenerSettings
member.summary: Settings for location listening (only applies to iOS). All defaults are set as indicated in the docs for CLLocationManager.

member.name: P:Plugin.Geolocator.Abstractions.ListenerSettings.AllowBackgroundUpdates
member.summary: Gets or sets whether background location updates should be allowed (>= iOS 9). Default: false

member.name: P:Plugin.Geolocator.Abstractions.ListenerSettings.PauseLocationUpdatesAutomatically
member.summary: Gets or sets whether location updates should be paused automatically when the location is unlikely to change (>= iOS 6). Default: true

member.name: P:Plugin.Geolocator.Abstractions.ListenerSettings.ActivityType
member.summary: Gets or sets the activity type that should be used to determine when to automatically pause location updates (>= iOS 6). Default: ActivityType.Other

member.name: P:Plugin.Geolocator.Abstractions.ListenerSettings.ListenForSignificantChanges
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the location manager should only listen for significant changes in location, rather than continuous listening (>= iOS 4). Default: false

member.name: P:Plugin.Geolocator.Abstractions.ListenerSettings.DeferLocationUpdates
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the location manager should defer location updates until an energy efficient time arrives, or distance and time criteria are met (>= iOS 6). Default: false

member.name: P:Plugin.Geolocator.Abstractions.ListenerSettings.DeferralDistanceMeters
member.summary: If deferring location updates, the minimum distance to travel before updates are delivered (>= iOS 6). Set to null for indefinite wait. Default: 500

member.name: P:Plugin.Geolocator.Abstractions.ListenerSettings.DeferralTime
member.summary: If deferring location updates, the minimum time that should elapse before updates are delivered (>= iOS 6). Set to null for indefinite wait. Default: 5 minutes

member.name: P:Plugin.Geolocator.Abstractions.Position.Timestamp
member.summary: Gets or sets the timestamp of the position

member.name: P:Plugin.Geolocator.Abstractions.Position.Altitude
member.summary: Gets or sets the altitude in meters relative to sea level.

member.name: P:Plugin.Geolocator.Abstractions.Position.Accuracy
member.summary: Gets or sets the potential position error radius in meters.

member.name: P:Plugin.Geolocator.Abstractions.Position.AltitudeAccuracy
member.summary: Gets or sets the potential altitude error range in meters.
member.remarks: Not supported on Android, will always read 0.

member.name: P:Plugin.Geolocator.Abstractions.Position.Heading
member.summary: Gets or sets the heading in degrees relative to true North.

member.name: P:Plugin.Geolocator.Abstractions.Position.Speed
member.summary: Gets or sets the speed in meters per second.

member.name: F:Plugin.Geolocator.Abstractions.GeolocationError.PositionUnavailable
member.summary: The provider was unable to retrieve any position data.

member.name: F:Plugin.Geolocator.Abstractions.GeolocationError.Unauthorized
member.summary: The app is not, or no longer, authorized to receive location data.

member.name: P:Plugin.Geolocator.CrossGeolocator.IsSupported
member.summary: Gets if the plugin is supported on the current platform.
